title: Habitat
content:
- A **habitat** is a geographical **place**, area, or environment, which an **organism lives**.

 - It has **[physical features](hypercards/Science/10SCI/Ecology/Biotic)** - non-living features including temperature, amount of light, etc.

 - It also has **[biological features](Science/10SCI/Ecology/Abiotic)** - including prey, competitors, food availability, etc.

 - Organisms **[adapt](Science/10SCI/Ecology/Adaptation)** to their habitats.
